entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Wasagaming
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wasagaming 1:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:58 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:58 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:58 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
